description:
Ever wonder how successful entrepreneurs put the right people in the right places to grow their business and become a thriving company? Teamwork is everything! This course is filled with successful entrepreneurs sharing their secrets and personal examples of how they create an incredible team.

In the different sections of this course you will find assessments and exercises walking you through the team building process to help you know who to hire in order to watch your organization thrive. The sections the course is divided into are as follows:

1. Build Powerful Teams

2. The Power of Teams

3. Selecting Your Team Members

4. Developing Your Team Members

Having an understanding that you can't go it alone is critical to the success of your business. After completing this course you will have a better understanding of how and when to hire someone to fill the positions you need throughout the growth of your organization.
title: Build Your Team Like a Pro: Partners and Employees
